h2_title: Son of Stones Boss Fight and Guide
content: When he gets back up, use the Plantain Fan to stagger him and remove the lightning attacks and then folow up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Son_of_Stones.md', within the main section titled 'Son of Stones', specifically from the subsection 'Son of Stones Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When he gets back up, use the Plantain Fan to stagger him and remove the lightning attacks and then folow up.
